summary: updgrades stats for one handed silver sword  and some rare clothes I used
descriptionHtml:
higher damage level for one handed silver sword weapon now powerfull sword. adds higher  armor levels for some "0" clothes I use in game like :

mythic tunic gloves 60+ armor for hglvl crctr
mage hood (art one like on pic) 50+ armor for hglvl crctr
farmer clothes (green npc like on feadel) 120+ armor for hglvl crctr
merchant clothes (blue one like on picture) 140+ armor for hglvl crctr
hammerfell clothes (cloak one)  130+ armor for hglvl crctr
boots ( golden buttons and grey one) 80+ armor for hglv crctr

now player have good armor in those clothes like ligt armor. and fight with fine silver sword.  and present two wallpaper what if skyrim box picture  like bethesda fallout armor cover.
author: strangermoon
